bill.title: Phased-in minimum wage increase provided, low-income workers enabled to meet basic needs, working family credit increased, child care assistance increased to all low-income workers and reimbursement rates increased, MFIP grants increased, funding provided by closing a tax loophole for high-income individuals with income exempt from Social Security taxes, basic sliding fee child care assistance program forecasted, rulemaking authorized, and money appropriated.
bill.description: Phased-in minimum wage increase provided, low-income workers enabled to meet basic needs, working family credit increased, child care assistance increased to all low-income workers and reimbursement rates increased, MFIP grants increased, funding provided by closing a tax loophole for high-income individuals with income exempt from Social Security taxes, basic sliding fee child care assistance program forecasted, rulemaking authorized, and money appropriated.
